resources.string:
Hi my name is Arif. 

I am a software engineer. 

Im working as a Software Engineer at ShareTrip. 

Im working on iOS Platform. 

I lived in Dhaka, Bangladesh. 

I am very passionate about mobile development. 

I loved to do code. 

I also try to be a religious person, practicing muslim. I want to be a good man also. 

Life is short, try to utilize it mostly. Be prepare for the next steps, be smart, be calculative, be hardworking and be passionate.
